title: Prawn and vegetable curry
ingredients: ['2 to 3 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, sliced', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon garam masala', 'salt to taste', '5 green chillies, seeded and chopped', '200g (7 oz) raw peeled prawns', '2 tablespoons water', '1 bag prepared stir-fry vegetables', 'handful fresh coriander, finely chopped', '2 cherry tomatoes, chopped - to serve']
